title: Compiler 'intel@19.0.5.281' has executables that are missing or are not executable:

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
$ mkdir -p /root/.spack/linux
$ cat > /root/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml <<EOL
compilers:
- compiler:
    target: x86_64
    operating_system: centos7
    modules: []
    spec: intel@19.0.5.281
    paths:
      cc: stub
      cxx: stub
      f77: stub
      fc: stub
    flags: {}
EOL
$ source spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
$ spack install intel@19.0.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```

### Error Message
```console
$ spack --debug --stacktrace install intel@19.0.5.281 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```

### Information on your system
```
$ cat /root/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml 
compilers:
- compiler:
    target: x86_64
    operating_system: centos7
    modules: []
    spec: intel@19.0.5.281
    paths:
      cc:  stub
      cxx: stub
      f77: stub
      fc:  stub
    flags: {}
```
